pr_title: Update Javadocs and CHANGELOG for Platforms / minor code style changes

timeline.message: Update Javadocs and CHANGELOG for platforms

timeline.bodyText: @louismurerwa we don't include RuntimeException (which IllegalArgumentException) in the method signature if such an exception is from checking arguments.
